Package inventroyManager

Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
inventroyManager.InventoryManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLIInterface
public class InventoryManager extends Object
This class controls inventory operations, manages inventory of BookItem,GroceryItem and ElectronicItem items and provides CRUD - Create New, Read, Update and Delete - operations.
